mapper.select: select u.id, username, real_name, email, tel, sex, concat(uf.path, '/', uf.name, uf.postfix) as avatar, avatar_file_id, status, del_flag, login_ip, depart_ids, user_identity, login_date, u.remark from ums_admin u join ums_user_role uur on u.id = uur.user_id left join ums_file uf on u.avatar_file_id = uf.id where uur.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT u.id, username, real_name, u.email, tel, sex, concat(uf.path, '/', uf.name, uf.postfix) as avatar, avatar_file_id, status, del_flag, login_ip, depart_ids, user_identity, login_date, u.remark, login_address FROM ums_admin u join ums_user_dept uud on u.id = uud.user_id join ums_dept ud on uud.dept_id = ud.id left join ums_file uf on u.avatar_file_id = uf.id
ud.parent_list like CONCAT((select parent_list from ums_dept where id = #{deptId}),'%')
username like CONCAT(#{username},'%')
real_name like CONCAT(#{realName},'%')
order by u.id

select u.id, username, real_name, email, tel, sex, concat(uf.path, '/', uf.name, uf.postfix) as avatar, avatar_file_id, password, status, del_flag, login_ip, depart_ids, user_identity, login_date, login_address, u.remark from ums_admin u left join ums_file uf on u.avatar_file_id = uf.id where u.username = #{username};
